thread.section_title: Hotel Monge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cozy and delicate hotel
thread.title_full: Cozy and delicate hotel - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: TR190489
title: Cozy and delicate hotel
text: Nice hotel with very neat decoration and easy walking distance to Notre dame and Latin quarter. The surroundings are also Perfect with some small cafes and very Parisian style and rather quite. Got a beautiful room towards the garden park behind the hotel. The breakfast was also good in the lobby area. Would come back here privatly also later on.
